summary: Replaces \"Fus Ro Dah\" with \"Ho Ho Ho\"
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the Unrelenting Force\'s \"Fus Ro Dah\" with \"Ho Ho Ho.\" Inspired by: http://bit.ly/uovcYm

Hear Santa and his mighty Thu\'um!!! Check the video section for an example. Replaces both males and females.

-Best used with this mod: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2216 (Santa Outfit)


INSTALLATION:
Drop contents into your installation directory, or install with NMM.

CREDITS:
Huge help from mjmax\'s mod: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3176.
Santa sound effect courtesy of SFXsource: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=flSjRBwRYCI

Inspired by: http://ladyloolauren.com/2011/12/24/merry-christmahanukwanzaakah/


Changelog:
v2: Added support for females (Hear Mrs.Claus\'s Thu\'um!)
author: Megustar
